channel.title: Server help...plz read!
channel.description: I downloaded a 562 client+source. I cannot still find that file that deals with the welcome message in chatbox. For example; "Welcome to poopscape" "Owner is poop". I want to change that. I tried going to client.java, searched up "welcome" and it didnt find anything. I did the same for actionsender.java and found something for welcome. I changed it, compiled and ran server, and still nothing changed. I did the same for packethandler.java and found nothing for " welcome". Know any other file that deals with the welcome message in the chatbox? Please help!!!!!

item.title: Server help...plz read!
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“Say wut?, post:2, topic:404552”]I know a solution.

Delete java since you don’t need it.[/quote]

Fuck you he is asking for simple help and you come here doing that shit. Don’t post unless you know how to help.

Read full topic
